s.text: Henceforth, this column will refer to the show as This Week until either Donaldson or Roberts wins top billing.
Pat Buchanan ( The McLaughlin Group ) takes the long view of the investigation.
Meanwhile, the pundits scoff at the trial balloon reported on the CBS Evening News Friday night and semisourced to the White House: Clinton and Lewinsky only played kissy face.
Tone it down a tad, or at least bring a froth cup when you appear before cameras.)
